text: Petteri Lampinen (born 5 February 1975) is a Finnish bandy player who plays for Russian side Rodina. Petteri plays in defence and has gained three national champions medals whilst at Edsbyns IF. Petteri plays for the Finnish national bandy team. He made his debut near the start of 21st century while he was still a Tornio PV player. ==Clubs== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Club ! title: Petteri Lampinen
